mission_data.mission_description: Two-bridge mission where one bridge plays a TSN station under attack, and the other bridge plays a Pirate ship. Will they cooperate?

big_message.title: Helms Deep
big_message.subtitle1: by Dave Thaler and Colin Chick

set_ship_text.name: Pirate Score: 0
set_ship_text.desc: +10 for each asteroid piece mined^+ # credits earned via any other mechanism^+ unknown for other special actions
set_ship_text.scan_desc: You'll just have to try things to see what else might affect your score.

set_ship_text.name: TSN Score: 0
set_ship_text.scan_desc: You'll just have to try things to see what else might affect your score.

event.name: TSN Intro
event.incoming_comms_text: The enemy armada is approaching DS1! You will have to hold it on your own, unless you can get those pirates out there somewhere to assist.^^You have an AI MineLayer at your command with |MineLayerMines| mines.

event.name: Explorer near SG1
event.incoming_comms_text: SG1 appears to be a stargate of some sort, with a wormhole to another part of space.

event.name: Clear mines left if minelayer destroyed

log.text: Clear mines left if minelayer destroyed

event.name: Clear mine layer button when empty

log.text: Clear mine layer button when empty

event.name: SG1 scanned
event.incoming_comms_text: Incoming distress call from Helms Deep

set_ship_text.name: TSN Score: |TsnScoreDisplayed|
set_ship_text.scan_desc: You'll just have to try things to see what else might affect your score, but the TSN got 50 points for finding this message!

event.name: Pirate Intro
event.incoming_comms_text: Your pirate ship will be scored based on how much Latinum you can collect, whether from mining or looting or any other means.

event.name: Enable Stargates
event.incoming_comms_text: Mayday! Mayday! We are under attack and are in need of assistance from anyone available! If you assist us, we will give you 1/3 of our credits (score) at the end. To accept, use this code at the stargate nearest you.

log.text: Replenish A0 when HPL starts at |A0HitPointsLeft|
Replenish A1 when HPL starts at |A1HitPointsLeft|
Replenish A2 when HPL starts at |A2HitPointsLeft|
Replenish A3 when HPL starts at |A3HitPointsLeft|
Replenish A4 when HPL starts at |A4HitPointsLeft|
Replenish A5 when HPL starts at |A5HitPointsLeft|
Replenish A6 when HPL starts at |A6HitPointsLeft|
Replenish A7 when HPL starts at |A7HitPointsLeft|
Replenish A8 when HPL starts at |A8HitPointsLeft|
Replenish A9 when HPL starts at |A9HitPointsLeft|

event.name: Recruit Miner1
event.incoming_comms_text: Ok, we agree to join you.

event.name: Recruit Miner2
event.incoming_comms_text: Ok, we agree to join you.

event.name: Recruit Miner3
event.incoming_comms_text: Ok, we agree to join you.

event.name: Recruit Miner4
event.incoming_comms_text: Ok, we agree to join you.

event.name: Recruit Miner5
event.incoming_comms_text: Ok, we agree to join you.

event.name: Recruit Miner6
event.incoming_comms_text: Ok, we agree to join you.

set_ship_text.name: Pirate Score: |PirateScoreDisplayed|
set_ship_text.desc: +10 for each asteroid piece mined^+ # credits earned via any other mechanism^+ unknown for other special actions
set_ship_text.scan_desc: You'll just have to try things to see what else might affect your score, but the pirates got 50 points for finding this message!

event.name: Victory with pirates

log.text: Giving pirates |AssistanceReward| bonus for helping TSN succeed

event.incoming_comms_text: We thank you, pirates, for your assistance. Here are the |AssistanceReward| credits we promised.

big_message.title: Mission ended because Helms Deep was lost
